articles.author: Lara Smit
articles.title: A time 'to show resolve, not appeasement' says European Commission President in state of the union address - ABC News
articles.description: European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen delivers the annual state of the union address, saying "this is the time for us to show resolve, not appeasement".
articles.content:
European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen has delivered the annual state of the union address to the European Parliament, where she announced what lies ahead for the Continent.
